title: Operator Support System
detail: Safely unlock the full potential of your offshore unit. OSS provides real-time guidance to the operator based on data generated by equipment on board.

title: Events
caption: Digitizes and automates reporting.
detail: Digitizes and automates reporting so operators can focus on their primary tasks.

title: Lift
caption: Safer lifting operations.
detail: Makes operators aware of limitations of the jack-up by verifying the lifting operation's acceptability based on real-time data. It allows operators to unlock the full potential of the Mobile Offshore Unit. Designers can, for example, combine a jack-up with a larger crane without compromising safety.

title: Jack
caption: Real-time guidance during preload operations.
detail: Gives real-time guidance during preloading operations. Instead of relying on human judgment, the application applies algorithms to the jacking system data to guide the operator efficiently towards a safe preload level.
